bug.question: I have six legs and like to crawl. I can be red, black, or brown, but I am very small. What am I?

hints.text: 🧺 I can carry things many times my own weight.
🍯 Sometimes you will find me near sweet things.

bug.question: I fly around flowers and make something sweet for you to eat. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I have black and yellow stripes.

bug.question: I have colorful wings and fly from flower to flower. Before I had wings, I was in a cocoon! What am I?

hints.text: 🎨 I am known for my beautiful wings.

bug.question: I hop and jump with very strong legs. I am usually green and love to eat plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I can make a chirping sound.
🌿 I am often found in fields and gardens.

bug.question: I am a small, red bug with black spots. People say I bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🍀 Some people think I bring good fortune.

bug.question: I light up the night with my glowing bottom. I'm a beetle, not a fly, what am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am also called a lightning bug.
🌙 I glow to attract a mate.
🌳 You can often see me in the summer at night, near trees.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my dinner. I have eight legs, but I am not an insect. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My web is made of silk.
🍎 Some people are scared of me.

bug.question: I march in long lines, carrying food back to my colony. We work together, even though we're tiny. What are we?

hints.text: 💪 We are very strong for our size.
🍫 We like crumbs, sugar, and other sweets.

bug.question: I am a master of disguise, blending in with leaves and twigs. I look like a stick, and that helps me survive. What am I?
I build my home from saliva and small sticks. I carry my house on my back. I live in streams and ponds. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 My home is called a case.
🐛 I am the larval stage of an insect.
💧 I need clean water to survive.

plant.question: I have a stem and leaves, and I need water to grow. What am I?
I am red, round, and yummy, and I grow on a plant. What am I?

hints.text: 🍔 You can slice me and put me in your burger

plant.question: I have a trunk, branches, and leaves. Birds like to build their nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍂 My leaves fall in the autumn.
🪵 You can use me to build houses

plant.question: I have a bright color, and bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 You can give me as a gift

plant.question: I am long and green and grow in a pod. You can eat me raw or cooked. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am a popular side dish.

plant.question: I am a plant that grows underground, and animals like to dig me up. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 You can make french fries from me.

plant.question: I'm a tall plant that gives you corn on the cob. What am I?
I'm a very prickly plant that lives in the desert. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I live in very hot places.

plant.question: I am a plant that has seeds in a pod, and I can be roasted. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 Some people are allergic to me.
🧈 You can make a spread out of me.

plant.question: I'm a tree that gives you a sweet treat that monkeys love. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys love to eat my fruit.
